snippet: For the fifth time in 11 seasons the Steelers have the top defense, an astonishing stranglehold on opposing offenses that have changed drastically in that time.
abstract: Pittsburgh Steelers, after a slow start, have again seized the mantle of top defense in NFL for the fifth time in 11 seasons, with an astonishing stranglehold on opposing offenses that have changed drastically during that time.
lead_paragraph: For the fifth time in 11 seasons the Steelers have the top defense, an astonishing stranglehold on opposing offenses that have changed drastically in that time.

headline.seo: Steelers’ Defense, Slowed by Injuries, Still Ranks at the Top
headline.main: Slowed by Age and Injuries, Steelers Still Have an Iron Grip
headline.print_headline: After Slow Start, Steelers Have Iron Grip Back
